welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Noida, a vibrant city known for its modern infrastructure, shopping malls, and bustling urban life. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring all that Noida has to offer!"

terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and busiest terminal at Indira Gandhi International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newly renovated terminal dedicated to handling all international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Indira Gandhi International Airport, handling both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free wifi for up to 45 minutes after which they can purchase additional time or use the free wifi again.
